#include <bits/stdc++.h>
//#define getchar_unlocked() getchar()
using namespace std;
//int scan_d()    {register int ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0;for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked());for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())ret=ret*10+ip-'0';return ret;}
//#include<conio.h>
//#define neg_inf -999
int LIS(int a[],int n)
{
	vector<int> temp;
	int i;
	temp.push_back(a[1]);
	for(i=2;i<n+1;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]>=*(temp.end()-1))
		temp.push_back(a[i]);
		else if(a[i]<*(temp.begin()))
		temp[0]=a[i];
		else
		{
			int start=0,end=temp.size()-1,mid;
			while(start+1<end)//ans=end
			{
				mid=(start+end)/2;
				if(temp[mid]<=a[i])
				start=mid;
				else end=mid;
			}
			temp[end]=a[i];
		}
	}
	return temp.size();
}
int main()
{
	int n,m,j,maxi=-999,i,cnt=0,no;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int a[n+1];
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		//dis[i]=-999;
	}
	maxi=LIS(a,n);
	printf("%d\n",maxi);
	//getch();
	return 0;

}
